Package org.blab.types

Interface TypeMapper<T>

Record Components:
T - - type to be mapped
public interface TypeMapper<T>
Type mapper for inter-service type conversions. The provided schemas are assumed to be correct.

  • Method Details

    • mapToBytes

      byte[] mapToBytes(T obj)
      Convert T to corresponding byte array.
      Parameters:
      obj - - object to convert
      Returns:
      Object's binary representation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given object cannot be converted to a byte array.

    • mapFromBytes

      T mapFromBytes(byte[] bytes)
      Convert byte array to T.
      Parameters:
      bytes - - byte array from which the object will be retrieved
      Returns:
      The object corresponding to the given binary representation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given array connot be converted to an object.

    • mapToAvro

      org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord mapToAvro(org.apache.avro.Schema schema, T obj)
      Convert an object of type T to an Avro record matching the specified schema.
      Parameters:
      schema - - Avro schema
      obj - - object to convert
      Returns:
      An Avro record that represents a given object according to a given schema.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given object cannot be mapped using the specified schema.

    • mapFromAvro

      T mapFromAvro(org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord record)
      Convert the Avro record to an object of type T.
      Parameters:
      record - - Avro record to convert
      Returns:
      T object corresponding to record's schema.
